overview: Interaction designer, specialize in creating the whole process of brand experience, interface design for web/mobile apps. Has an experience working with technological teams and creating friendly and innovating UX. Working with various international corporates and startups including: BBDO, Snoox, Bizibox, Teva, WishMash, Sorezki Labs and more.
